routines: visiting electronics and video game stores

Additionally, his visits to bookstores reflect a curiosity and openness to learning. Overall, he seems to be an introverted yet agreeable individual who is conscientious about his punctuality and responsibilities. With a well-rounded approach to education—indicated by his high school background—he maintains a middle-class socioeconomic status. Future patterns may include continued exploration of tech-related hobbies or studying subjects related to electronics and media.
